name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion
notes:
!ATTENTION! After installation:
1) Set option: "Do not launch game, only open Steam"
2) Run the prefix
3) Right click your prefix and select "Run EXE inside prefix"
4) Select "Sins of a Solar Empire Rebellion.exe"

Currently I'm searching a way to bypass the StardockLauncher
You can fiddle around with the Steam Launch Option: "/nolauncher" did not worked for me yet.

If any First Time Setups fail on your system configuration you can skip them by killing the install task. All dependencies are installed by this installer.
content:
game:
  appid: 204880
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine Prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win32
    description: Changeing to Windows XP
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Direct X 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2012
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Visual C++ 2012
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Dot.NET 4.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
